strings.SS2_NEMEXECUTIONER_DESCRIPTION:
The Nemesis Executioner takes away the lives of those who are lost in a coup de grace for what he envisions as the greater welfare.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Death doesn't fear itself.
strings.SS2_NEMEXECUTIONER_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so he left, fading into the unknown.
strings.SS2_NEMEXECUTIONER_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so he returned, legacy lost forever.
strings.SS2_NEMEXECUTIONER_SPECIAL_DESCRIPTION: <style=cIsDamage>Slayer.</style> 1500% scythe dash. heal nearby on kill. hold to increase distance
strings.SS2_NEMEXECUTIONER_SPECIAL_ALT_DESCRIPTI: fly and buff and duration on kill
